items.title: Down the Rhodes
items.text: Bunny's favorite albums featuring the Fender Rhodes electic piano from laid back vibes to driving funk rhythms. Enjoy!
items.author: AudioBunny

items.title: Larry Heard
items.text: Often refferred to as the godfather of deep house Larry Heard a.ka. Mr Fingers delivers soulful, heart-warming rhythm tracks and futuristic synth driven sci-fi grooves.
items.author: AudioBunny

items.title: MF DOOM
items.text: Remembering a true pioneer of innovative wordplay and mind-bending metaphors: MF DOOM.
items.author: AudioBunny

items.title: Donuts Samples
items.text: Discover the samples used by J Dilla on his groundbreaking album Donuts.
items.author: AudioBunny

items.title: Madvillain Samples
items.text: Discover the samples used by Madlib on the collaboration with MF Doom.
items.author: AudioBunny

items.title: SP-1200 Treasures
items.text: A collection of records made on the classic SP-1200 drum machine.
items.author: AudioBunny
